channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: OOglies
channel.desc: The OOglies slip, slide and splat all over the place. This fast-paced, madcap stop-motion animation uncovers the mischief everyday household objects get up to when no-one is looking. The thrill-seeking eggs go iron-boarding and superhero Slippy Banana saves the day... sort of! Stunt Tomato thrills with a daredevil tightrope trick, the toast soldiers ambush an unsuspecting egg, and Mr and Mrs Strawberry enter a talent show and get a bit of extra help.
